text: Voistynu, Allah kupyv u viruyuchykh yikhni dushi y mayno v obmin na ray. Vony vedutʹ borotʹbu na shlyakhu Allaha, vbyvayutʹ i buvayutʹ ubyti. Taka pravdyva obitsyanka, dana v Taurati, Indzhili y Korani. Khto zh krashche vykonuye obitsyanky, nizh Allah? Tozh radiyte uhodi, yaku vy uklaly z Nym! Tse — velykyy uspikh
